text: Spéracèdes is a commune. It is found in the region Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur in the Alpes-Maritimes department in the south of France. ==References== *INSEE ==Other websites== *Commune's official website *Commune's events, life, and news : "Spéracèdes Demain" association's website Category:Communes in Alpes-Maritimes
title: Spéracèdes
